appBarLangTooltip: Change web language on browser settings
stepSourceDescRefresh: You can refresh source code to the latest state or click NEXT to go to the next step
stepSourceDescDownload: Before you go to the next step, you have to download Tasmota source code
stepWifiConfDesc: Enter SSID and password for your WiFi network
stepFeaturesDesc: Which features should be included in final binary firmware?
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-minimal: The Minimal version allows intermediate OTA uploads to support larger versions and does NOT change any persistent parameter. This version should NOT be used for initial installation.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-lite: The Lite version without most drivers and sensors.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota: The Tasmota version with most drivers. RECOMMENDED RELEASE BINARY.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-knx: The Knx version without some features but adds KNX support.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-sensors: The Sensors version adds more useful sensors.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-ir: The InfraRed Receiver and transmitter version allowing all available protocols provided by library IRremoteESP8266 but without most other features.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-display: The Display version without Energy Monitoring but adds display support.
stepFeaturesBuild-tasmota-zbbridge: The dedicated Sonoff Zigbee Bridge version.
stepFeaturesArduinoSlaveTooltip: Support for external microcontroller slave on serial
stepFeaturesDisplaysTooltip: Add support for I2C and SPI diplays
stepFeaturesIOExpMCPTooltip: Add support for Input/Output pin expander: MCP230xx
stepFeaturesIRBasicTooltip: Basic infrared support (smaller binary and memmory usage). Exclude the use of full infrared support.
stepFeaturesIRFullTooltip: Full infrared support (bigger binary and memmory usage). Exclude the use of basic infrared support.
stepFeaturesMQTTTLSTooltip: This feature will work with version 6.6.0.9 or later (latest development).
stepFeaturesRFTransceiverTooltip: Support for RF transceiver using library RcSwitch
stepFeaturesRulesTooltip: It includes IF STATEMENT and EXPRESSION. Rules exclude the use of scripts.
stepFeaturesScriptTooltip: Script excludes the use of rules
stepFeaturesWebInterfaceTooltip: For most users this should be enabled. Disable in case you need smaller binary and less memmory usage. If disabled, interaction with Tasmota firmware will only be possible via MQTT broker.
stepFeaturesZigbeeTooltip: Enable serial communication with Zigbee CC2530 flashed with ZNP or EFR32 EmberZNet devices (like Sonoff Zigbee Bridge) flashed with EZSP
stepCustomParamsDesc: Below you can enter custom parameters, which will be included at the end of {filename} file. If you don't know what it is, just click Next.
stepVersionDesc: Select Tasmota and Arduino Core version. Choose the language you want to use and your hardware.
stepDownload: You can now download custom compiled binary and files used during compilation:
